themes: Need for immersive art and entertainment
Conversion of idle city properties to cultural use
Lack of physical venues for cultural programming
City responsibility in supporting cultural spaces
key_phrases: Immersive art and entertainment in all its forms
create / support a physical theater in every city district
Idle City properties needs to be converted to cultural use
this pavilion is one of Austin's most important treasures yet today it is off limit. UNACCEPTABLE
there is nowhere to program in Austin
The lack of venues stifles cultural innovation
barriers_identified: Idle city properties not accessible for cultural use
Lack of available venues for programming
solutions_proposed: Create or support a physical theater in every city district
Donate buildings or sites for cultural use
Convert specific city properties (2101 Jesse E. Segovia St, 3002 Guadalupe Street, 411 Chicon Street, 1621 Nash Hernandez Senior Rd) to cultural venues
